Module dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform
Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform

Class Resources

java.lang.Object
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.Resources
public final class Resources
extends java.lang.Object
Provides safe access to resources. IO exceptions are caught and logged.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static Application APPLICATION
    Service-loaded application executor
    static AudioFactory AUDIO_FACTORY

    static RenderMedium RENDER_MEDIUM
    Service-loaded render medium

  • Method Details

    • inStream

      public static java.io.InputStream inStream​(java.lang.String path)
      Retrieves an input stream to a resource. Attempts to load occurrences in order: [path, classpath].
      Parameters:
      path - path to resource
      Returns:
      input stream to resource; or null if no such resource

    • outStream

      public static java.io.OutputStream outStream​(java.lang.String path)
      Retrieves an output stream to a resource.
      Parameters:
      path - path to resource
      Throws:
      java.io.UncheckedIOException - if an IO error occurs
